Field Detail

POPUP_REGION_KEY

public static final String POPUP_REGION_KEY
Since:
1.1
See Also:
Constant Field Values

popups

protected Map popups
Maps of popups where keys are service IDs(==popup IDs) and values StandardPopupFilterWidget.PopupServiceInfo. Used for rendering popups.

allPopups

protected Map allPopups
Used to keep track of popups that have been opened from thread and not yet known to be closed.

opener

protected Widget opener
Widget that opened this popup. Only applicable to threads.

threadServiceFactory

protected ServiceFactory threadServiceFactory
When creating new popup with unspecified service, popup is acquired from the factory.

open

public String open(Message startMessage,
                   PopupWindowProperties properties,
                   Widget opener)
Description copied from interface: PopupWindowContext
Registers a new thread-level service server-side and gives started service means of communicating with its opener and vice-versa.

Specified by:
open in interface PopupWindowContext
Parameters:
startMessage - The message sent to the newly created service (thread).
properties - The properties specifying behaviour and appearance of the creatable popup window.
opener - The widget that is registered as an opener of the created thread.
Returns:
The thread level ID of the created and registered service.

                   PopupWindowProperties properties,
                   Widget opener)
Description copied from interface: PopupWindowContext
A method for registering already created service under ThreadContext as a popup.

Specified by:
open in interface PopupWindowContext
Parameters:
service - The service to register.
properties - The properties specifying behaviour and appearance of creatable popup window.
opener - The widget that is registered as an opener of the created thread.
Returns:
The ID of the created service.

Description copied from interface: PopupWindowContext
Closes the server-side thread service (serving client-side popup).

Specified by:
close in interface PopupWindowContext
Parameters:
id - The thread (popup) ID to close.
Returns:

removePopup

public void removePopup(String id)
Only removes the popup from the view of this StandardPopupFilterWidget, retains the servicing session thread.

getOpener in interface PopupWindowContext
Returns:

getPopups

public Map getPopups()
Description copied from interface: PopupWindowContext
Provides all opened and unclosed popups.

Specified by:
getPopups in interface PopupWindowContext
Returns:
A Map of popups where the keys are IDs of the threads (Strings) and the value are instances of PopupServiceInfo.

Services provide their services through the action(...) method. An implementation of a non-composite service like BaseService uses the action method to hook in the middle of the action routing and provide filtering, logging etc.

getRegions

public Map getRegions()
Description copied from interface: UpdateRegionProvider
Will be called only when updateregion filter is activated on AJAX requests.

Specified by:
getRegions in interface UpdateRegionProvider
Returns:
map containing regions that will be passed to client-side. Map must have region names as String keys and region contents as String values. Region contents will be passed to client-side Javascript region handler, designated by region name. May return null or empty map. If map contains a null value, then that region is not included in response.
Since:
1.1
